messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

wrong notification receiver sent friday your request for assistance completed hi could you please check why receiving below thank you monitoring engineer en ops ops sent wednesday your request for assistance completed help with your query dear we believe your following request for assistance resolved reference number summary update tracker resolution details tracker updated resolution date please if you believe resolved if we hear you within days query be closed our kind regards ref msg
